title: Stalked
description: DASHI have craved my mate even before I knew her, if anyone thinks that they can stop us from being together they will find out what a wolf does when his mate is threatened. I have gone through life hoping to find happiness, the happiness that only my mate can give me, anyone that threatens our bond will face my wrath.ALASKAI have always lived a quiet, simple life. I mostly keep to myself, so when I find myself with a stalker I am scared. Dash explodes into my life changing everything I have ever believed, everything I have ever felt safe with. I feel out of my depth, way out of my comfort zone, but I have never felt so alive before.
author: Alexi Ferreira
